overview:
John Alfano is an entrepreneur trying to revolutionize the way companies do business, the way companies like Facebook and Twitter revolutionized the way people keep in touch.

John is the founder of Global Renewable Energy Network (GReEN), a technology company that leverages the power of social media to help professionals and companies in the renewable energy industry develop and grow their businesses.

Global Renewable Energy Network (GReEN) is the premier business network for professionals and companies involved in the development, commercialization, and utilization of renewable energies (e.g. bioenergy, geothermal, hydro, hydrogen, ocean, solar, and wind), worldwide.

By focusing his 10+ years of experience and expertise in marketing and technology on the renewable energy industry, John is hoping to help change the world.
